accountid.label: Account id
accountid.comment:
Your 6 digits bpost account ID used for the Shipping Manager.
http://bpost.freshdesk.com/solution/articles/4000061189

passphrase.label: Passphrase
passphrase.comment: The passphrase you entered in bpost Shipping Manager back-office application. This is not the password used to access bpost portal.

api_url.label: API url
api_url.comment: Do not modify this setting if you are not 100% sure of what you are doing.

manage_labels_with_magento.label: Use Magento to manage labels
manage_labels_with_magento.comment: If you enable this option, labels are generated directly within Magento. It is not needed to use the bpost Shipping Manager for these tasks. Pop-ups must be enabled in your browser, in order to view the printed labels. Click here to learn more about this option.

label_format.label: Label format
label_format.comment: Choose between A6 or A4 format

automatic_retour_labels.label: Automatic retour labels
automatic_retour_labels.comment: If you enable this option, a retour label is automatically added and printed when generating labels. If disabled, you are able to manually create retour labels.

automatic_track_and_trace_information.label: Automatic track and trace information
automatic_track_and_trace_information.comment:
If you enable this option, the bpost Track & Trace link will be added in the Magento mail templates. It is always possible to manually send these emails.
http://bpost.freshdesk.com/solution/articles/4000062605

choose_delivery_date.label: Choose delivery date
choose_delivery_date.comment: Allow customer to choose their delivery date

next_day_delivery_allowed_till.label: Next day delivery allowed till
next_day_delivery_allowed_till.comment: If the order is placed after this cut-off time, an extra day is added to the displayed date. Order placed = end of checkout.

saturday_delivery_cost.label: Saturday delivery cost
saturday_delivery_cost.comment:
Additional fee when using saturday delivery option, e.g.: 4.95.
Dear customer, if you decide to offer your own consumers the option of Saturday delivery, you need to select 'Display delivery date' in the general parameters of the plugin and enter the requested information.

weight_unit.label: Weight unit
weight_unit.comment: Used to calculate the weight before sending it to bpost

browser_api_key.label: Google browser API key
browser_api_key.comment: bpost uses Google Maps API to display the map in the frontend.  Note: This is optional if you will not meet the usage limits. Visit Google’s online documentation for more information.

server_api_key.label: Google server API key
server_api_key.comment: bpost uses Google Geocoding API to calculate GEO location based on the shipping address.  Note: This is optional if you will not meet the usage limits. Visit Google’s online documentation for more information.
